trans-unit.resname: V16·1 | Beseech the Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Beseech the Queen
trans-unit.target: Beseech the Queen

trans-unit.resname: V16·1 | Beseech the Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: V16·1 | Beseech the Queen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.
trans-unit.target: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

trans-unit.resname: V16·2 | Cabal Ritual | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cabal Ritual
trans-unit.target: Cabal Ritual

trans-unit.resname: V16·2 | Cabal Ritual | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

trans-unit.resname: V16·2 | Cabal Ritual | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: V16·2 | Cabal Ritual | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Patriarch is long dead, but his name still stains the lips of cultists.
trans-unit.target: The Patriarch is long dead, but his name still stains the lips of cultists.

trans-unit.resname: V16·3 | Conflux | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Conflux
trans-unit.target: Conflux

trans-unit.resname: V16·3 | Conflux | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: V16·3 | Conflux | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's self-indulgent, I admit, but I do like to watch my own symphony play itself out."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: "It's self-indulgent, I admit, but I do like to watch my own symphony play itself out."\n—Nicol Bolas

trans-unit.source: Dark Depths
trans-unit.target: Dark Depths

trans-unit.resname: V16·4 | Dark Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it.

trans-unit.resname: V16·4 | Dark Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}: Remove an ice counter from CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {3}: Remove an ice counter from CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: V16·4 | Dark Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, put a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible named Marit Lage onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, put a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible named Marit Lage onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: V16·5 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.source: Once Mirrodin's brightest hope. Now Phyrexia's cruel champion.
trans-unit.target: Once Mirrodin's brightest hope. Now Phyrexia's cruel champion.

trans-unit.resname: V16·8 | Mind's Desire | Card Name

trans-unit.target: Mind's Desire

trans-unit.resname: V16·8 | Mind's Desire | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.target: Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

trans-unit.source: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
trans-unit.target: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary

trans-unit.resname: V16·9 | Momir Vig, Simic Visionary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

trans-unit.resname: V16·9 | Momir Vig, Simic Visionary | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

trans-unit.target: Near-Death Experience

trans-unit.resname: V16·10 | Near-Death Experience | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.

trans-unit.resname: V16·10 | Near-Death Experience | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.
trans-unit.target: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.
